dublin_core.dcvalue: CORE Group convened this mHealth community of practice in response to interest in community level applications that can increase quality equity scale and or sustainability of health efforts As part of CORE Group s larger Community Health Network this interest group is a place where ideas experience and expertise converge Health program implementers and researchers work together to identify needs and gaps brainstorm solutions present data share insights and lessons learned and engage in dialogue with a range of participants including scholars advocates policymakers donors multilateral representatives and the private sector including technology groups Refer to this site for publications recent discussions and other resources
